user.title: Ddareungi setup
user.description:
Choose a collection method. Each method provides different data.

- **API (OpenAPI Polling)**: Real-time station availability + location-based recommended station (requires an OpenAPI key)
- **Cookie (Ddareungi Pulling)**: Your rental/return history + favorite stations status (requires a login cookie / expires)

You can add this integration multiple times (e.g., set up both methods).

api.title: API method (OpenAPI Polling)
api.description:
Enter your OpenAPI key and options.

- **OpenAPI Key**: Request/issue from [Seoul Open Data Plaza (dataset)](https://data.seoul.go.kr/dataList/OA-15493/A/1/datasetView.do)
- **My location entity (optional)**: Used as the reference point for recommended stations
- **Update interval (seconds)**: API polling interval (too low may hit rate limits)
- **Station IDs**: Comma/newline separated (station number or ST code)
  - Example: `4796`, `ST-2693`
  - Tip: ST code is the most accurate.

cookie.title: Cookie method (Web Pulling)
cookie.description:
Paste a cookie from a browser logged into [Ddareungi](https://www.bikeseoul.com).

- **Cookie**: Copy values such as `JSESSIONID` from DevTools → Application/Storage → Cookies → bikeseoul.com
- If updates stop, the session likely expired. Log in again and paste a new cookie.
